remarks: The value of the partial isomorphism A at the lattice zero is the singleton of the identity translation i.e. the zero subspace. (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2013.)
statement:
dia0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dia0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
dia0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dia0.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia0 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( I ` .0. ) = { ( _I |` B ) } ) $.
